name: postgres-xc
desc: PostgreSQL cluster based on shared-nothing architecture
caveats:
To get started with Postgres-XC, read the documents at
  https://sourceforge.net/projects/postgres-xc/files/Publication/
  https://postgres-xc.sourceforge.io/docs/1_0/tutorial-start.html

For a first cluster, you may start with a single GTM (Global Transaction Manager),
a pair of Data Nodes and a single Coordinator, all on the same machine:

  initgtm -Z gtm -D /home/travis/Homebrew/var/postgres-xc/gtm
  initdb -D /home/travis/Homebrew/var/postgres-xc/datanode1 --nodename datanode1
  initdb -D /home/travis/Homebrew/var/postgres-xc/datanode2 --nodename datanode2
  initdb -D /home/travis/Homebrew/var/postgres-xc/coord --nodename coord

Then edit:

  /home/travis/Homebrew/var/postgres-xc/datanode1/postgresql.conf
  /home/travis/Homebrew/var/postgres-xc/datanode2/postgresql.conf

and change the port to 15432 and 15433, respectively.

Then, launch the nodes and connect to the coordinator:

  gtm -D /home/travis/Homebrew/var/postgres-xc/gtm -l /home/travis/Homebrew/var/postgres-xc/gtm/server.log &
  postgres -i -X -D /home/travis/Homebrew/var/postgres-xc/datanode1 -r /home/travis/Homebrew/var/postgres-xc/datanode1/server.log &
  postgres -i -X -D /home/travis/Homebrew/var/postgres-xc/datanode2 -r /home/travis/Homebrew/var/postgres-xc/datanode2/server.log &
  postgres -i -C -D /home/travis/Homebrew/var/postgres-xc/coord -r /home/travis/Homebrew/var/postgres-xc/coord/server.log &
  psql postgres
    create node datanode1 with (type='datanode', port=15432);
    create node datanode2 with (type='datanode', port=15433);
    select * from pgxc_node;
    select pgxc_pool_reload();

To shutdown everything, kill the processes in reverse order:

  kill -SIGTERM `head -1 /home/travis/Homebrew/var/postgres-xc/coord/postmaster.pid`
  kill -SIGTERM `head -1 /home/travis/Homebrew/var/postgres-xc/datanode1/postmaster.pid`
  kill -SIGTERM `head -1 /home/travis/Homebrew/var/postgres-xc/datanode2/postmaster.pid`
  kill -SIGTERM `head -1 /home/travis/Homebrew/var/postgres-xc/gtm/gtm.pid`

If you get the following error:
  FATAL:  could not create shared memory segment: Cannot allocate memory
then you need to tweak your system's shared memory parameters:
  https://www.postgresql.org/docs/current/static/kernel-resources.html#SYSVIPC
